dublin_core.dcvalue: This article provides an overview of the current state of the art for incorporating personal digital assistants PDAs into nursing education The development of PDA technology and the lessons learned by educators integrating PDA technology into nursing curricula are described The current cycle of PDA evolution is discussed and contrasted with a proposed model for maximizing the impact of PDAs on technological innovation in nursing education and practice
The Nursing clinics of North America
Back to the future: personal digital assistants in nursing education.
